mapper.sql: id, member_name, title, create_time, order_num, receive_terminal ,content
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from notice
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from notice ORDER BY order_num DESC
SELECT MAX(order_num) AS orderNum FROM notice
mapper.insert: insert into notice (id, member_name, title, create_time, order_num, receive_terminal, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into notice
id,
member_name,
title,
create_time,
order_num,
receive_terminal,
content,

mapper.update:
update notice
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_name = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_terminal = #{record.receiveTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update notice set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_name = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_terminal = #{record.receiveTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update notice set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_name = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_terminal = #{record.receiveTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update notice
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_terminal = #{receiveTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
